name: Chris Jordan
bio: A good cook is like a sorceress who dispenses happiness. There is nothing dessert can’t solve. Desserts are edible love. Cooking for others is a work of great joy. When life gives you lemons, make lemonade. Childhood is waiting to be an adult so you can eat dessert first, only to get there and then never doing it. I am always learning to become good at my work. Cooking is like painting or writing a song. Just as there are only so many notes or colors, there are only so many flavors — it’s how you combine them that sets you apart. We can easily turn our wrong work into a delicious item.

foodDetails.method: Position rack in upper third of oven; preheat broiler to high. Line a baking sheet or broiler pan with foil and coat with cooking spray. Mash garlic and 1/2 teaspoon salt on a cutting board with a fork to make a thick paste. Combine with 1 tablespoon oil, thyme and 1/4 teaspoon pepper. Place the fish on the prepared pan and spread the paste on top of it.
